data.Sentence_cn: 不久前，一架轻型客机偏离了航线，
data.Sentence: When a light passenger plane flew off course some time ago,

data.Sentence_cn: 在山区坠毁，飞行员丧生。
data.Sentence: it crashed in the mountains and its pilot was killed.

data.Sentence_cn: 机上仅有的乘客，一位年轻的妇女和她的两个女婴却平安无事。
data.Sentence: The only passengers, a young woman and her two baby daughters, were unhurt.
It was the middle of winter.
Snow lay thick on the ground.

data.Sentence_cn: 这位妇女知道，即使最近的村庄也有数英里远。
data.Sentence: The woman knew that the nearest village was miles away.

data.Sentence_cn: 天黑下来的时候，她把提箱当作小床，把两个孩子放了进去，
data.Sentence: When it grew dark, she turned a suitcase into a bed and put the children inside it,

data.Sentence_cn: 又把所有能找到的衣服都盖在了孩子们身上。
data.Sentence: covering them with all the clothes she could find.
During the night, it got terribly cold.

data.Sentence_cn: 这位妇女尽可能地靠近孩子，甚至自己也想钻进箱子里去，
data.Sentence: The woman kept as near as she could to the children and even tried to get into the case herself,

data.Sentence_cn: 第二天一大早，她听到头顶上有飞机飞过，但不知道怎样才能发个信号。
data.Sentence: Early next morning, she heard planes passing overhead and wondered how she could send a signal.

data.Sentence_cn: 她在雪地上踩出了“SOS”这3个字母。
data.Sentence: She stamped out the letters 'SOS' in the snow.

data.Sentence_cn: 幸运得很，一位飞行员看到这个信号，用无线电给最近的城镇发了报。
data.Sentence: Fortunately, a pilot saw the signal and sent a message by radio to the nearest town.

data.Sentence_cn: 不久，一架直升飞机飞抵飞机失事现场，来搭救这几个幸存者。
data.Sentence: It was not long before a helicopter arrived on the scene to rescue the survivors of the plane crash.
